We're glad to announse brand new version of our product Live Wallpapers:
- 5 categories of wallpapers added: abstract, cities, landscapes, nature, science. Preview content by categories and find what you like!
- Featured wallpapers, updated daily! Never miss top and latest wallpapers. Special collections of content for each holiday and calendars for each month!
- Pictures preview improved, watch live wallpapers x5 faster
- New look of small thumbnails - preview pictures before open
- Improved tutorial with step-by-step instruction
- New share options - share your favorite wallpapers with friends
- Tons of new free live wallpapers available
- New app icon and UI in brand new colors, please let us know what you think in reviews
- Performance and stability improvements

Premium Access:
- Access to preview new live wallpapers, coming tomorrow
- Unlimited access to special premium content
- No ads

- Enjoy amazing content in all categories in new version!
- For your best experience, ​we made performance and stability improvements
If you love our app please rate and review it with 5 stars!

Thanks for using Live Wallpapers Now! We appreciate all your feedback and ratings. 

What's new:
* Discover new amazing content in all categories
* General performance and stability improvements

Thanks for using Live Wallpapers Now!

- Minor UX enhancements.
- Discover new amazing & bright 4k-quality live wallpapers in all categories!
- We are constantly working behind the scenes to make the app faster and more reliable.

Please, leave us some feedback and feel free to suggest us your ideas and concerns. Best to you!

Thanks for using Live Wallpapers Now!

- We’ve added a detailed instruction of Live Wallpaper’ setting!
- Minor UX enhancements.
- Meet brand new categories: for boys and aesthetic! Stay tuned!
- Performance and stability improvements.

Please, leave us some feedback and feel free to suggest us your ideas and concerns. Best to you!

Meet the first-of-its-kind feature — COLOR SEARCH!
*COLOR SEARCH. We added a color-detection search. All you have to do is to capture any object with your camera. The app will define main colors on the picture and offer live themes with the same or closely related colors. For example, you take a picture of yourself wearing a red dress. The app offers you red live themes that perfectly match your look.
*SIRI SHORTCUTS. Tap once or easily use voice to get to any category to choose a new theme. Or quickly get to the favorite tools — Live Photo Maker or Color Search.

Content-related improvements:
* 4K CONTENT. Explore dozens of new unique 4K-quality live themes. We partnered with talented artists worldwide to ensure that you get the best quality wallpapers on your screens.
* OM NOM COLLECTION. Together with the creators of Om Nom, Zeptolab, we’ve added the free live wallpapers pack with amazing Om Nom. Find the category in the app menu.
* QUOTES. Get inspired with wise words every time you’re checking the screen.
* CALENDARS. Always be ready for the upcoming month with our rich choice of amazing calendars. Expect 17 various-in-styles February calendars.

Make-more-fun Features:
* LIVE PHOTO MAKER. We’ve optimized the work of the Live Photo Maker. Create live wallpapers out of your own videos smoothly and enjoy favorite moments. Plus, add sparkling stickers to make your live wallpapers even more fun.
* iMessage STICKERS. Make the conversation with friends fun — get the free iMessage Stickers pack available only for our users.

User Experience improvements:
- Many users were confused by not obvious swiping of live wallpapers. We added hints to make clear that swiping without the Navigation bar is available too.
- We improved general stability performance.

Features to expect soon:
*SPOTLIGHT SEARCH. Navigate faster thru hundreds of live wallpapers
*FINISHING FILTERS. Live Photo Maker filters to add even more fun to made-by-you live themes.

Thanks for all the feedback. We improve what you say us to fix. Leave reviews. Let us know your ideas and concerns.
Best to you!
